pullRequest.title: RDM-8598 - Integration tests for external search API
pullRequest.bodyText:
JIRA link (if applicable)
https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/RDM-8598
Change description
Implement Integration tests for external search API
Does this PR introduce a breaking change? (check one with "x")
[ ] Yes
[x] No

commit.message: RDM-8598 - Introduce embedded ES for integration testing; including configuration/data load and sample test
Init ES data only when required
RDM-8598 - Integration tests for external ES search endpoint

nodes.bodyText: Not sure how good that embedded one. Test containers are simple in general https://www.testcontainers.org/modules/elasticsearch/
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -256,6 +256,7 @@ dependencies {
     testCompile group: 'io.rest-assured', name: 'rest-assured', version: '3.1.0'
     testCompile group: 'com.xebialabs.restito', name: 'restito', version: '0.9.3'
     testCompile 'io.github.openfeign:feign-jackson:9.7.0'
+    testCompile 'pl.allegro.tech:embedded-elasticsearch:2.7.0'

nodes.bodyText: Is this test working as expected? - when trying this locally I get a 500 response with Problem getting case type version for 'casetypeA,casetypeB'.
This should be available now so we should uncomment this line
